about_the_game: A smattering of shoddy hats to equip yourself with in-game. We paid close to $100 for these hats and we are offering them to you for the measly sum of $1.95. You can't get any fairer than that. And people say we are greedy!
detailed_description: A smattering of shoddy hats to equip yourself with in-game. We paid close to $100 for these hats and we are offering them to you for the measly sum of $1.95. You can't get any fairer than that. And people say we are greedy!
name: Cash Grab - Hat Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Better
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device

short_description: A smattering of shoddy hats to equip yourself with in-game. We paid close to $100 for these hats and we are offering them to you for the measly sum of $1.95. You can't get any fairer than that. And they said we were greedy!
